Name: Alabaster
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Gold rum (1-3 years old pot & column blend)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of small lime wedge on rim.
Review: Aloe liqueur sits brilliantly with clove-led falernum in this refined rum sour.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2023 by Jake Powell, bar manager at Death & Co. in Denver , USA. Originally made with Probitas rum .
Nutrition: One serving of Alabaster contains 163 calories
